Name: Phoenix's Feather
Description: When you experience death while attuned to this item, the feather is set ablaze, burning your body to ashes. From the ashes, this flame reforms your body. The feather takes a day to restore itself.
flavorText: A single, radiant feather that glows with a warm, golden light, pulsating softly like a heartbeat. The feather feels almost alive in your hand, emanating a comforting warmth. Said to contain the essence of rebirth and eternal flame, it is a rare and powerful symbol of hope and renewal.
